CommSubscription.name: CommSubscription
CommSubscription.description: Represents the subscription options for a specific communication.

DataUsePurposeId.description: ID of the data use purpose record associated with the communication subscription.

IsDefault.description: Indicates if this communication subscription is the default (true) or not (false). This field has a default value of false. Only one communication subscription record can be the default.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. Name of the communication subscription record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account owner associated with this customer.
